fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may curse a player on even numbered nights.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Curses last two nights or until someone is attacked by the curse.
- You will attack one player that visits a cursed target.
- You will learn the roles that visit your cursed target.
- With the Necronomicon, you may curse every night and will attack any player that is freed from the curse.
